positions.name: Senior Architect
responsibilities: Maintained digital ecommerce site, facilitating purchase of digital comics, as well as the delivery of the digital content from Amazon S3/Cloudfront
Developed frontend features using HTML/CSS and jQuery to provide the best experience possible for our users
Engineered backend solutions for our Django ecommerce site, supporting new features
Integrated external services (such as Apple App Store and Google Play) to automatically synchronize our data across the web
Streamlined performance by identifying pain points, fine tuning database queries and slow code, effective use of caching
Overhauled out-of-date systems based on the best available tools, and lessons learned over years of active upkeep and bug fixing
Designed internal facing tools, working closely with internal customers to gather specifications and deliver the most useful solutions
Created a custom asynchronous task manager to replace Celery / RabbitMQ so that we could monitor and manage our tasks directly in the Django admin

positions.name: Lead Software Engineer
responsibilities: Participated in hiring process, including interviewing and administering technical evaluations
Trained new developers
Mentored junior developers
Led development of a special-case CMS solution

positions.name: Lead iOS Engineer
responsibilities: Directed development of iOS app, including major refactors to use Core Data

positions.name: Senior Software Engineer

positions.name: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Participated in development of a green-field e-commerce website using django, which is still running today

positions.name: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Learned ICEFaces to create internal tool for QA team
Translated logic from legacy Python code to a new Java codebase
Communicated with members of other teams to gather requirements

positions.name: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Aided external customers in the extension and troubleshooting of Jive’s forum software (built in Apache Struts)
Analyzed Java thread dumps to diagnose large-scale performance issues
Identified and fixed bugs, including writing regression tests

positions.name: Software Developer
responsibilities: Ported python-based ETL tools to java, interfacing with Excel spreadsheets to load data into Oracle databases

Created and documented a generic xml-based ETL tool in Java, allowing other developers to simply define data mappings from Excel spreadsheets to Oracle databases, which was still in use years after I left

positions.name: Software Test Engineer

Developed automated tests using Selenium
